name: sonigraph
description: An Obsidian plugin that transforms the visual structure of your knowledge graph into music.

scripts.build: npm run audit:quick && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run build:css -- --no-fail-on-lint
scripts.audit:quick: npm run audit:innerHTML --silent && npm run audit:console --silent
scripts.audit:check: npm run audit:innerHTML && npm run audit:console && npm run lint
scripts.audit:innerHTML: ! grep -rn --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -E '\.(innerHTML|outerHTML)\s*=' src/ 2>/dev/null || (echo '❌ Found innerHTML/outerHTML usage' && exit 1)
scripts.audit:console: ! grep -rn --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' --exclude='logging.ts' 'console\.(log|debug|info)' src/ 2>/dev/null || (echo '❌ Found console statements' && exit 1)
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.build:deploy: npm run audit:quick && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run build:css -- --no-fail-on-lint
scripts.deploy: npm run build:deploy && cp main.js styles.css manifest.json /mnt/d/Vaults/Banister/.obsidian/plugins/sonigraph/ && echo '✅ Deployed to vault! Reload Obsidian (Ctrl+R) to see changes.'

author: John Banister
